thread.title: Veatrice Allen
thread.title_full: LuxHair Wigs reviewed by Veatrice Allen

author: Veatrice Allen
title: Veatrice Allen
text: I would say find the colors that fit you skin tone and see how nice it make you look. Your wigs our Sassy, and sharp. They don't look wigy if I can say. They looke like your own hair and it is because I bought it. I work as a receptionist at the unemployment office and so many compliment I get and just even when gwhen, out period. Walking to the bus stop, on my way to work, a lady came out of her house to compliment me and said it lays down so nice and ask where I got the wig at that I was wearing. At that time it was Especially Yours book, I even put their phone number in my phone so I could give out the number so they could receive the book so they could order your wigs. Thank so much. Please make the smaller size for small head and face people. Everybody is not the same size. Keep putting them out there because THEY OUR SHARP AND SASSY. I'm 63 years old and the Lord who I give the credit too keeps me looking young and your wigs.
